attributes.action: Stop the local council parking in Stansfield Road E16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A new council building opened in Newham at the end of Stansfield Road, since then both sides of Stansfield Road up to and past Beckton Farm there have been parked cars. I telehoned the council and they advised they were looking into it, of course they would it is the council that are parking there. Their is going to be a serious accident as it is single line traffic around a bend!  We need double yellows or tow away signs.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
